variable.name: AUTO_FILL_VARS
variable.value: PROJECT_DB, AUTO_FILL_CONFIG, PROJECT, AUTO_FILL_CONFIG, USER_NAME, AUTO_FILL_CONFIG

variable.name: CONFIG_INPUT_DESCRIPTOR
variable.value: PROMPT_FOR(PROJECT_DB, "getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(PVCS_CUST_ProjectDatabase)", "", ACCESSIBILITY(DESCRIPTION_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACSD_PVCS_CUST_ProjectDatabase);;MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_PVCS_CUST_ProjectDatabase_mnc)), SELECTOR_CMD_PROJECT_DATABASE_SELECTOR) PROMPT_FOR(USER_NAME, "getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(PVCS_CUST_UserName)", "", ACCESSIBILITY(DESCRIPTION_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACSD_PVCS_CUST_UserName);;MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_PVCS_CUST_UserName_mnc))) PROMPT_FOR(PROJECT, "getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(PVCS_CUST_ProjectName)", "", ACCESSIBILITY(DESCRIPTION_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACSD_PVCS_CUST_ProjectName);;MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_PVCS_CUST_ProjectName_mnc)), SELECTOR_CMD_PROJECT_SELECTOR) PROMPT_FOR(ROOTDIR, "getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(PVCS_CUST_WorkfileLocation)", "", ACCESSIBILITY(DESCRIPTION_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACSD_PVCS_CUST_WorkfileLocation);;MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/pvcs/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_PVCS_CUST_WorkfileLocation_mnc)), SELECTOR_DIR)

property.name: exec
property.value: ${RUNR} pcli Put ${PRIDPP} ${FORCE_PUT} $[? CHECK_IN_OUT] [$[? CHECK_IN_OUT_LOCK] [-l${QUOTE}${LOCK_DESCRIPTION}${QUOTE}] [-u]] [] $[? ASSIGN_REVISION] [-r${ASSIGN_REVISION}] [] $[? ASSIGN_VERSION] [-v${QUOTE}${ASSIGN_VERSION}${QUOTE}] [] $[? FLOATING_LABEL] [-fv] [] ${START_BRANCH} $[? DESCRIPTION_FILE] [-m@${QUOTE}${DESCRIPTION_FILE}${QUOTE}] [-m${QUOTE}${message}${QUOTE}] -ym ${QFILES} ${NUR}

property.name: exec
property.value: ${RUNW} pcli Get ${PRIDPP} ${RECURSIVE} ${SHOULD_LOCK} ${WRITABLE} $[? REVISION] [-r${REVISION}] [] $[? VERSION] [-v${QUOTE}${VERSION}${QUOTE}] [] $[? DO_CHECKOUT_BY_DATE] [$[? CHECKOUT_BY_DATE] [$[? CHECKOUT_BY_DATE - DATE_OPERATION_IDENT] [${CHECKOUT_BY_DATE}] [-d${DATE_BEFORE}]] [-u${DATE_AFTER}]] [] ${SET_CURR_TIME} $[? FILE] [${QFILES}] [.] ${NUR}

DESCRIPTION_FILE] [-m@${QUOTE}${DESCRIPTION_FILE}${QUOTE} -t${QUOTE}${WF_DESCRIPTION}${QUOTE}] [-m${QUOTE}${message}${QUOTE} -t${QUOTE}${message}${QUOTE}] ${KEEP_LOCK} $[? WORKDIR_REL] [/${WORKDIR_REL}] []$[? FILE] [/${FILE}] []${QUOTE} $[? DESCRIPTION_FILE] [-m@${QUOTE}${DESCRIPTION_FILE}${QUOTE} -t${QUOTE}${WF_DESCRIPTION}${QUOTE}] [-m${QUOTE}${message}${QUOTE} -t${QUOTE}${message}${QUOTE}] ${KEEP_LOCK} $[?
